description: A usecase dashboard, which can be used to monitor key server stat and health during a server activity, like 1. Restart, 2. Software upgrade, 3. Investigation etc.,

options.content:
#

Key metrics ( Metrics Reference ) which needs to be monitored during a server activity, like 1. Restart, 2. Software upgrade, 3. Investigation etc., Data is shown as stats, error and resources, resource utilization is displayed for the TopK major consumers at a service and namespace level

panels.title: PI Query - Long, Short, Aggr, UDF (rate) (total)
SI Query - Long, Short, Aggr, UDF (rate) (total)

panels.description:
Namespace migrate_tx_partitions_remaining (transmit) and migrate_rx_partitions_remaining (receive)
rx_partitions_active and
tx_partitions_active
panels.title: Migration Fresh (Partitions)

targets.expr:
(aerospike_latencies_write_ms_bucket{cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^", le="+Inf"})
- ignoring (le)
(aerospike_latencies_write_ms_bucket{cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^", le="$latency_time_bucket"})

panels.title: Duplicate Resolutions - Ask, Respond, No Read (rate) (total)

panels.description:
Display both TopK and BottomK of resource utilization % by each node and namespace 
(data_used_bytes/data_total_bytes)*100
panels.title: % Data used (vs Size) (topk & bottomk)

panels.description:
Display both TopK and BottomK of memory utilization % by each node and namespace 
(memory_used_bytes/memory_size)*100
panels.title: % Memory used (vs Size) (topk & bottomk) (deprecated)

panels.description: Display TopK and BottomK of device, pmem or storage resource utilization across each node and namespace
panels.title: % Data - used, available (topk)

list.description: node or service in a cluster
list.label: Node
list.name: node

title: Rolling Restarts
